issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.9 (foreground color: #8fce00, background color: #ffffff, font size: 18.0pt (24px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.91:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #71a300.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.91:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #71a300.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > header > div > div:nth-child(1)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.95:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #aa6708.

original_issue.selector: html > body > div > header > div > div:nth-child(2)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.95:1. Recommendation:  change background to #aa6708.

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).
